description: Dashboard using Prometheus Exporter built in OPNSense Appliance designed to be used with PMM v2

panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together
panels.title: CPU Busy

matcher.options: Harware Corrupted - Amount of RAM that the kernel identified as corrupted / not working
Idle - Waiting for something to happen

targets.expr: avg by (node_name,mode) (clamp_max(((avg by (mode,node_name) ( (clamp_max(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance=~"$node_name",mode!="idle"}[$interval]),1)) or (clamp_max(irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance=~"$node_name",mode!="idle"}[5m]),1)) ))*100 or (avg_over_time(node_cpu_average{instance=~"$node_name", mode!="total", mode!="idle"}[$interval]) or avg_over_time(node_cpu_average{instance=~"$node_name", mode!="total", mode!="idle"}[5m]))),100))

title: OPNSense Firewall
